content: My son's 19th birthday is May 28th, his name is Pfc.Phillip Stalvey. I haven't heard from him in months. When he came out of boot camp he was very disrespectful to me I told him that if he kept it up i was call in his co. and ask him if that is what they taught thier recruits to be disrespectful to their mothers. well he kept on and called and talked to his recruiting Gunny. I haven't heard from my son in months. I am a Mother with a broken heart.I ahve no idea what my sois doing or his where abouts.If somne one is on base at lejeune and knows him please tell him happy 19th birthday. I love and miss my son!!! Very Proud Marine Mom Hope of Pfc. Phillip Stalvey
